<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Status Update Webhooks"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"event"}
  path={"webhook"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



We send a webhook for every change in a Import File status. The status might be:

|Status Code|Status Description|  
|----------|:-------------|
|ENQUEUED|Indicates that the file was enqueued| 
|PROCESSING|Indicates that the file is being imported|
|PARSED|Indicates that the file was parsed|
|COMPLETED|Indicates that the file was imported| 
|ERROR|Indicates that some error occurred| 

You can sign this webhook in the logged area of this portal or via [API](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook), with the entity ```ImportFile```.
You can also configure the security validation method for the requests, which can be either ```mTLS Certificate``` or ```Hash Signature (HMAC SHA256 Hash)```.

For more information on the security validation methods, check the ```AUTHORIZATIONS``` section below.

For more information on webhooks, see the [Webhook Documentation](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook).


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"description":"Import File webhook.","type":"object","properties":{"pactualId":{"description":"Unique resource Identifier (Uuid) generated by api.","type":"string","title":"PactualId"},"clientRequestId":{"description":"The unique transaction identification given by the client side. This value can't be repeated.","type":"string","title":"ClientRequestId"},"createTimestamp":{"description":"Entity's creation timestamp.","type":"string","title":"CreateTimestamp"},"lastUpdateTimestamp":{"description":"Entity's last update timestamp.","type":"string","title":"LastUpdateTimestamp"},"entity":{"description":"Entity's name.","type":"string","title":"Entity"},"status":{"description":"The state of the import file, which at the time of its creation will be ENQUEUED.\n","enum":["ENQUEUED","PROCESSING","PARSED","COMPLETED","ERROR"],"type":"string","title":"ImportFileStatus"},"body":{"description":"Import File webhook body.","type":"object","properties":{"importType":{"description":"Type of file to upload. If you use this webhook in the Depositary Bank Integration, you will receive this field as Depositary Bank","type":"string"},"description":{"description":"Some description","type":"string"},"importSubType":{"description":"Subtype file. If you use this webhook in the Depositary Bank Operation, you will receive the Payment Network name in this field (Visa, Mastercard, Hipercard, Elo, Amex)","type":"string"},"fileName":{"description":"The name of the file","type":"string"}},"title":"ImportFileWebhookBody"},"tags":{"description":"Tags that can be sent by the client, it will be saved on the Entity, use as a metadata field","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["tag1","tag2"],"title":"Tags"}},"title":"ImportFileWebhook"},"examples":{"SETTLED":{"value":{"pactualId":"53f6d1bd-b22d-4459-a0a7-e3ba8dfd8e9a","clientRequestId":"4ad17514-0aa7-4fbe-ba6b-4518695fe059","createTimestamp":"2022-12-26T16:39:50.6211702+00:00","lastUpdateTimestamp":"2022-12-27T17:51:18.5131974+00:00","entity":"ImportFile","status":"ENQUEUED","body":{"importType":"DepositaryBank","description":"teste","importSubType":"Visa","fileName":"1a722b8c-f376-4b60-9416-07beeecb2c81_19134c58-7b6c-4cb1-a3dd-cd8bb98184bd.xlsx"},"tag":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
